title: Mac client patcher won't open
body: So I tried to log in after being disconnection for non activity after finishing a game only 15 minutes ago. It would no let me log in it said something along the lines of "unspecified error please check logs" so I tried multiple times to no avail and therefore uninstalled the game. Now after trying to re download the game when I try to open the patcher the league of legends icon pops up in the middle of my screen for a second like usually but immediately goes away and the patcher never launches and it says league of legends is not running. I have looked up countless accounts online of the same incident with no real solution. Can anyone please help me? Again it is on a mac.

replies.body: when i click on mine, the lolpatcherUX bounces on the dock couple of times and disappear. :/ anyone have slution?
guys i am running captian any ideas ??!?!?!?! uhh this is  really getting me mad

I've been experiencing the same problem since yesterday. I've tried many methods but none of them seems to work. Help pls! :(
mac version 10.9.5

Hey all,

A lot of you have been posting about having issues opening the Mac Client in the last day or so.  Most reports have been of players saying that they launch League of Legends, and then nothing occurs.  There are a few steps you can take that should resolve this:

1)  If you have recently upgraded to Yosemite (OSX 10.10), you may need to [complete a fresh re-installation](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) of League of Legends on the new 10.10 version.

2)  Make sure that your connection is stable.  If you are on wifi, disable this and connect directly to your router via wired Ethernet Cord.  In addition, make sure to try all of the steps in our [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

3)  Some players have reported that [this trick](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/8b0EJ8nP-mac-wont-open-dec-3-2014-fix) has succeeded in opening the client.

If all else fails, don't give up just yet!  Make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our Tech Team.  They can look into the issue further and provide some additional solutions! :)

I think I have a solution for this (I am running Yosemite IDK what version just got a mac) this is what i did
I opened up league front he application folder and the patcher said "unspecified error check crap logs blah blah blah"
i just left that open for like 1 min
then i opened league again from the application folder and it ask to terminate the other league, i press ok
then it says unspecified error blah blah blah
then i open league again from the application folder and the patcher itself opens successfully

hope this works for you guys too
yw
well mine just started working lol, i just left it alone for a while and clicked on it and it started working again. Wish i could give more specific answer to help but idk....
This exact thing happened to me. Don't know how to fix it.
